name: Mortal Kombat Juice
description: A deadly concoction of cranberry juice, vodka, and a hint of souls for that extra kick.

name: Dino Fever
description: Experience the prehistoric allure with our aged red wine, a taste that transcends time.

name: The Ricky Bobby
description: Shake and bake with this explosive mix of diet coke, rum, and a drizzle of maple syrup.

name: The Swifties
description: A refreshing blend of gin, elderberry, and lemon juice that will leave you feeling swift and light.

name: The Little Man
description: A robust combination of whisky, bitters, and a twist of orange peel, fit for the bold.

name: Bioshock Bliss
description: Find your paradise with the Bioshock Bliss, featuring tequila, triple sec, freshly squeezed lime juice, a touch of agave nectar, and a rim of salt for that perfect balance of sweet and savory.

name: Rapture Rum Runner
description: A luxurious blend of dark rum, banana liqueur, blackberry brandy, grenadine, and a splash of orange juice, reminiscent of the opulence of Rapture.

name: The Old Sport
description: Experience the elegance of Gatsby's Garden Party, featuring gin, St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur, freshly squeezed lime juice, muddled mint leaves, and topped with crisp club soda, a floral delight fit for the grandest soir√©es.
